CustomField.description: Formula field that calculates of the declaration is valid today.
CustomField.formula: IF ( AND ( gaid__Active__c, NOT(gaid__In_Cooling_off_Period__c), OR(ISBLANK(gaid__Start_Date__c), gaid__Start_Date__c <= TODAY()), OR(ISBLANK(gaid__End_Date__c), gaid__End_Date__c >= TODAY())), true, false)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula field that calculates of the declaration is valid today.
CustomField.label: Valid Now
